original: de la bas med dmigs med der bzhag na //

original: de nyid nyams drod nyams su gsal na yang //

original: des na dran tsam rtog pa ci byung yang //
analyzed: des na dran tsam rtog pa ci byung yang //

analyzed: de bzhin ma bcos nyid kyis la bcad pas //

original: ngang gis ma bcos yang gis 'od gsal ba //

original: rnal 'byor gsum don de yi skabs na rdzogs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gsum don de yi skabs na rdzogs //

analyzed: de mthong phan chad dam pa nyid yin pas //

original: des na byas zin btsal med der nges nas //
analyzed: des na byas zin btsal med der nges nas //

original: des ni zin chags bde sdug ci byung ba //

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes dmigs pa kun dang bral //

original: la bcar mthong bas gud na yod med do //

translated: see that they are not separate when they look into this.

original: gal te yod par 'dod na skyon chen yin //

original: dam pa dman 'gyung  @341a *//
analyzed: dam pa dman 'gyung  @341a *//

analyzed: ma smig rgyu'i tshul //

original: der ni kun 'dus kun la mthong ba med //
analyzed: der ni kun 'dus kun la mthong ba med //

analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong snang la rang bzhin med //

original: kun 'dus gsang ba'i dgongs spyod zab mo ni //
analyzed: kun 'dus gsang ba'i dgongs spyod zab mo ni //

analyzed: rang byung rang rig mngon sum snang dus na //

original: rang byung ye shes de nyid mthong zhes bya //
analyzed: rang byung ye shes de nyid mthong zhes bya //

original: de ltar dgongs pa dam pa mthong ba'i tshe //
analyzed: de ltar dgongs pa dam pa mthong ba'i tshe //
translated: When the sublime intention is seen in that way,

original: rtog chags kun sangs mthong yul 'das pa ste //
analyzed: rtog chags kun sangs mthong yul 'das pa ste //

original: bya med snang med mi btsal bzhag pa'o //

original: de don ma skyes ma byung ma skyes te //

analyzed: de ltar gang rig de nyid tshogs gnyis rdzogs //

original: don la mnyam bzhag blo bcos skyon nyid na //

analyzed: de dang 'gal zhing de dang phad mi 'gyur //

original: de las nges blo khyab par btang ba ni //
analyzed: de las nges blo khyab par btang ba ni //

original: de dang mi 'gal de nyid nges pa ste //
analyzed: de dang mi 'gal de nyid nges pa ste //
translated: It is certainty about that without contradicting that.

original: rang rig dus na de la gnyis su med //
analyzed: rang rig dus na de la gnyis su med //

analyzed: de yi dus na don dam nyams dod rdzogs //

original: snang dang mi snang rtag chad la sogs pa //
analyzed: snang dang mi snang rtag chad la sogs pa //
translated: Appearances and nonappearances, eternalism and nihilism, and so on,

original: nyams @341b drad nges par don gyi gting phol te //
analyzed: nyams @341b drad nges par don gyi gting phol te //
